data.prayer: Lord, there are 619,579 people in the state of Cluj who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cluj, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Cluj, Romania to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Cluj, Romania.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Cluj, Romania.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Azerbaijani people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, please defend the 44,909 believers in Cluj against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Cluj, Romania to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Cluj, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
